name: Remote Access Tool - RURAT Execution From Unusual Location
description: Detects execution of Remote Utilities RAT (RURAT) from an unusual location (outside of 'C:\Program Files')
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)

detection.query:
selection: [{"Image|endswith": ["\\rutserv.exe", "\\rfusclient.exe"]}, {"Product": "Remote Utilities"}]
filter: {"Image|startswith": ["C:\\Program Files\\Remote Utilities", "C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Remote Utilities"]}
